com.binary.core.exception

接口 Nestable

  • 所有已知实现类:
    BeanException, BinaryException, CompressionException, ConfigurationException, CoreException, EncryptException, FileSystemException, HttpException, MultipleException, ResourceException, SecurityException, SerializationException, ThreadPoolException

    public interface Nestable

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Throwable getCause()
      获取嵌套Throwable
      String getFullMessage()
      获取所有异常信息
      String getMessage()
      获取异常消息，以最外层向内推，直至含有消息
      Throwable getMessageThrowable()
      获取抛出异常消息的异常
      String getOriginalMessage()
      获取最里层嵌套异常消息
      Throwable getOriginalThrowable()
      获取最里层嵌套异常
